duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct personal risk management assessment of prospect’s portfolio and identify solutions and placement strategy.
Prepare comprehensive risk evaluation to include product and service requirements.
Deliver individual advice including advantages and disadvantages of various options.
Make recommendations during one-on-one meetings with prospects and clients.
Work with Business Development Executives and Client Advisors to grow and expand referral sources.
Incorporate and practice techniques introduced through Sales Training to enhance skills and related performance.
Update Sales system in an accurate and timely manner.
Ensure regulatory requirements are met and comply with internal policies and procedures.
Review and interpret carrier contract language to deliver optimal client coverage recommendations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree strongly preferred. P&C licensed and personal lines insurance experience necessary.
